definition: make synchronous and adjust in time or manner
details:
verb
- make synchronous and adjust in time or manner
= example: make synchronous and adjust in time or manner
= synonyms: sync
- cause to indicate the same time or rate
= example: cause to indicate the same time or rate
- operate simultaneously
= example: operate simultaneously
- arrange or represent events so that they co-occur
= example: arrange or represent events so that they co-occur
= synonyms: contemporise, contemporize
- make motion picture sound exactly simultaneous with the action
= example: make motion picture sound exactly simultaneous with the action
- happen at the same time
= synonyms: contemporise, contemporize
